name: Bustories
description: A small visual novel about bus trips and conversation with different companions, whom you see for the first and last time in your life.
minimum_requirements: OS: 7/8/10 Processor: 1.6 GHZ Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 256 MB Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: 7/8/10 Processor: 2 GHZ Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB Storage: 200 MB available space
